metadata.dc:description: Malignant melanoma of the esophagus is an extremely rare neoplasm. We presented a case of this neoplasm diagnosed on a cytologic smear from a 84 year-old women. The smear was characterized by scattered dissociated cells with hyperchromatic irregular nuclei, prominent nucleoli and occasional cytoplasmic brown pigment. The immunohistochemical study revealed positivity for HMB-45 and S-100 protein.
metadata.dc:title: Diagnóstico citológico de melanoma maligno de esófago.
[Cytological diagnosis of malignant melanoma of the esophagus].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
